title: Capacity Building workshop for Citizen Science -työpaja
content: Capacity Building workshop for Citizen Science jonni.karlsson… 5.2.2026 16:51:05 Event begins 27.2.2026 09:30:00 Event ends 27.2.2026 13:00:00 Location Helsingin yliopisto What parts of the research can be opened to public? Join for a half day in person citizen science themed workshop 27 February 9.30-13 (EET) in English with experts from Aarhus University , University of Turku and the national Open Science coordination . Learn the basics, share your experience or test your project idea with pee...
